title: Total War: SHOGUN 2 - Fall of the Samurai for Linux - Announcement trailer

json.text: warriors bound to a strict code.
Each sword was the soul of its owner.
Each katana gave its owner great power.
Learning to smelt ore for three days,
and learning how to temper the blade with water.
Too slow, and the cutting edge of will be soft,
but done properly... a sword that can cut the clouds in flight.
AMERICAN MAN: Capable of firing at a rate of over 200 rounds per minute,
with its rotating barrel and hand cranked automatic reloading system, this, gentlemen, is the gatling machine gun!
Dr. Richard J. Gatling, his gun is the finest weapon to provide a continuous, high rate of fire without cause for reloading.
With gatling guns in your arsenal, a crew of just four do the job of four score trade riflemen,
reducing the cost of your army and at the same time increasing its effectiveness, and all through American ingenuity.
Well, gentlemen, are you ready to sign?
